    Webiny Intro

    Author: Paulo Dyballa

    Being open source is more than having a public repo with a MIT licence. Webiny has been architected with hooks, plugins and life cycle events so you can customize every aspect of the platform and make it work exactly how you want it. Being open source is more than having a public repo with a MIT licence. Webiny has been architected with hooks, plugins and life cycle events so you can customize every aspect of the platform and make it work exactly how you want it.
